PageTitle: rpf-vector compatible standard (VPN instance PIM view)
FuncDef:
The rpf-vector compatible standard command configures a device to use the standard format to encapsulate Hello and Join/Prune messages that carry the vector attribute.
The undo rpf-vector compatible standard command restores the default configuration.
By default, a device uses the vendor-specific format to encapsulate Hello and Join/Prune messages that carry the vector attribute.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If a Huawei device uses the vendor-specific format to encapsulate Hello and Join/Prune messages that carry the vector attribute but its interworking non-Huawei device uses the standard format to encapsulate such messages, the two devices fail to communicate. To prevent this issue, run the rpf-vector compatible standard command to configure the Huawei device to use the standard format to encapsulate Hello and Join/Prune messages that carry the vector attribute.
Prerequisites
The function to enable Hello and Join/Prune messages to carry the vector attribute has been enabled.
